text: "Angola Avante!" (; "Forward Angola!") is the national anthem of Angola. Manuel Rui Alves Monteiro wrote the words. Rui Alberto Vieira Dias Mingas wrote the music. It was started in 1975 after independence from Portugal. ==Lyrics== ===Portuguese original=== Portuguese original IPA transcription ===Kikongo lyrics=== Kongo lyrics IPA transcription ===English translation=== I Oh Fatherland, we shall never forget The heroes of the Fourth of February. Oh Fatherland, we salute your children Who died for our Independence. ğ„† We honour the past and our History, As by our work we build the New Man. ğ„‡ ğ„† Forward, Angola! Revolution through the power of the People: A United Country, Freedom, One People, one Nation! ğ„‡ II Let us raise our liberated voices For the glory of the peoples of Africa. We shall march, Angolan fighters, In solidarity with oppressed peoples. ğ„† We shall fight proudly for Peace Along with the progressive forces of the world. ğ„‡ ==References== Category:African anthems Category:National symbols of Angola Category:1975 works
title: Angola Avante
